subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If baseball does not provide a suitable career for Garrett Olson, a Baltimore Orioles pitcher, he has a Plan B. He will return to California Polytechnic State University in San Luis Obispo, Calif., and earn a degree in mechanical engineering.
snippet: If baseball does not provide a suitable career for Garrett Olson, a Baltimore Orioles pitcher, he has a Plan B. He will return to California Polytechnic State University in San Luis Obispo, Calif., and earn a degree in mechanical engineering.
